meanings.sent1: The antifascists organized a peaceful protest against the fascist regime.
meanings.sent2: Many antifascists gathered to speak out against the rise of fascism in the country.
meanings.sent3: The antifascists jokingly called themselves the 'fascism fighters'.
meanings.sent4: In the battle of ideologies, the antifascists stood strong against the forces of oppression.
meanings.sent5: The image of the antifascists marching with banners against fascism was powerful.

meanings.definition: Those who actively resist and combat fascist ideologies and movements.
meanings.sent1: The antifascists bravely confronted the fascist group during the demonstration.
meanings.sent2: It takes courage to be one of the antifascists fighting against hate and discrimination.
meanings.sent3: The antifascists playfully referred to themselves as the 'fascism foes'.
meanings.sent4: The antifascists were the shield protecting society from the dangers of fascism.
meanings.sent5: The determination of the antifascists to stand up against oppression was inspiring.
